thread.title: CO Resident

author: CO Resident
title: CO Resident
text: This was my first time selling a gift card, and I was a bit apprehensive to do so. After researching a few similar companies, I chose CardKangaroo, mailed my card w/the receipt (last week), and crossed my fingers that it wasn't a scam. I became worried and emailed the company this morning, and they responded within 15 min., stating they'd just received my order and would process my payment later today; they said it takes up to 5 business days to receive cards, plus Monday was a holiday. My payment ended up processing within that same hour! I would definitely recommend this company to others, and will be using them again if needed. Thank you so very much CardKangaroo!! You helped me when I really needed it. Take care, and keep up the GREAT customer service!! ğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜ğŸ‘ğŸ½ğŸ‘ŒğŸ½
